name: Get 'em alive!
description:
The Death wants to kill them all!
Save your friends and revive them!!! Play against Death, Life vs. Death.

It`s a 2D-Sidescroller Prototype.

Move with: 

WASD, go over the people and "revive" them
--- Still in developement! ---

--- Prototype by Natalia Scigulla, Jasmin Wodarzcyk and Hannah Pollow ---
